title: Descriptive Text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the app has been launched
AND we are viewing the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Pick Your Favorite Teams button
custom_expected: THEN we see "Select your favorite team to display in your home view". In addition, your team's games will always appear first on the list of games." text on the left side of the screen

title: Pick Your Favorite Teams - Enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we are viewing Settings
custom_steps: WHEN we select & activate the Pick Your Favorite Teams button
custom_expected: THEN we jump to Pick Your Favorite Teams page

title: Pick Your Favorite Teams - Appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we have access to the current design - see __zpl.io/1Bq8Oo__
AND we are viewing Settings
custom_steps:
WHEN we select & activate the Pick Your Favorite Teams button 
AND we compare the appearance to the design
custom_expected: THEN everything appears as expected including: * All team logos * All Text

title: Pick Your Favorite Teams - Back via Menu Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
custom_steps: WHEN we activate the Remote's Menu button
custom_expected: THEN we jump back to Settings

title: Verify Favorite Teams- Team by Team appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
AND have access to the Favorite Team Styling in the current design - see __zpl.io/1Bq8Oo__
custom_steps:
WHEN we select & activate each Team button to enable 
AND we compare the enabled state in app with the expected designs
custom_expected:
THEN an "enabled" border appears as expected for each team button 
AND a the border is removed as expected for each team button deactivated 
AND every button can be selected 
AND the highlight appears as expected in both enabled and disabled states

title: Verify Followed Teams - Team by Team appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we have not chosen any Favorites
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
AND have access to the Following Picker page in the current design - see __zpl.io/1Bq8Oo__
custom_steps:
WHEN we toggle to Following Teams 
AND we select & activate each Team button to enable 
AND we compare the enabled state in app with the expected designs
custom_expected:
THEN an "enabled" border appears as expected for each team button 
AND a the border is removed as expected for each team button deactivated 
AND every button can be selected 
AND the highlight appears as expected in both enabled and disabled states

title: Favorite Follow Toggle / Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been launched
AND we have not selected any Favorite Or Followed Teams
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
WHEN we select & activate a Favorite 
AND we toggle to Following Teams 
AND we attempt to Follow our Favorite 
AND we select and activate several different Team Buttons 
AND we toggle back to Favorite Team and choose a new Favorite
custom_expected:
THEN we cannot Follow our Favorite team 
AND we are able to toggle between screens 
AND the text (Favorite/Follow) matches the expected page view 
AND Favorite/Follow functionality behaves as expected: * When we are viewing Favorite Team we always change the Favorite * When we we are viewing Following Teams we always change the Followed Teams * Favorite Team button cannot be Navigated to while a Favorite in either screen

title: Tile Order - Archive Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have launched the app
AND we have not selected a Favorite
AND we have navigated to Games View of a day with all Archive games & noted order of tiles
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
WHEN we choose a Favorite Team 
AND we toggle to Follow and select several teams 
AND we return to a schedule page in Games View in which the Favorite Team and Followed teams are included
custom_expected: THEN the correct Favorite appears anchored in the first position and Grid Order Priority Rules are maintained as follows (Order displays from left to right, top to bottom):

title: Tile Order - Upcoming Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have launched the app
AND we have not selected a Favorite
AND we have navigated to Games View of a day with __all upcoming games__ & noted order of tiles
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
WHEN we choose a Favorite Team 
AND we toggle to Follow and select several teams 
AND we return to a schedule page in Games View in which the Favorite Team and Followed teams are included
custom_expected: THEN the correct Favorite appears anchored in the first position and Grid Order Priority Rules are maintained as follows (Order displays from left to right, top to bottom):

title: Tile Order - Mixed Game States
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have launched the app
AND we have not selected a Favorite
AND we have navigated to Games View Today with __mixed Live/Upcoming/Final__ games & noted order of tiles
AND we are viewing Pick Your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
WHEN we choose a Favorite Team (appearing Today) 
AND we toggle to Follow and select several teams (appearing Today) 
AND we return to a schedule page in Games View in which the Favorite Team and Followed teams are included
custom_expected: THEN the correct Favorite appears anchored in the first position and Grid Order Priority Rules are maintained as follows (Order displays from left to right, top to bottom):

title: Account to App at Login - Favorites Added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The User has launched app, navigated to Settings, is not logged in and no favorites have been set
- Tester has set and noted favorites in MLB.com profile (login at http://mlb.mlb.com/home - then visit https://secure.mlb.com/account/profile.jsp )

NOTE: Top team in list is "Favorite" while additional teams are considered "Followed"
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to Settings> Log In 
AND User  Logs in to profile account 
AND closes Activation Message
AND In Settings activates Pick Favorite Teams
custom_expected: THEN Account-set favorite teams are tagged

title: Account to App at Login - Favorites Updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Tester has launched app, navigated to Settings, is not logged in and no favorites have been set
- Tester has set and noted favorites in MLB.com profile ( https://secure.mlb.com/account/profile.jsp )
custom_steps: 1. In Settings, choose Pick Favorite Teams 2. Choose 2 favorites that are not the same as the account-set favorite teams and note them 3. Back out to Settings and activate Login 4. Login to profile account and close Activation Message 5. Return to Pick Favorite Teams page
custom_expected: Account-set favorite teams are tagged, previous set teams are cleared - both Web and Device match

title: App to Account and Account to App Connection
custom_preconds:
- Tester has launched app, navigated to Settings, is not logged in and no favorites have been set
- Tester has confirmed no favorites have been set in MLB.com profile https://secure.mlb.com/account/profile.jsp
custom_steps: 1. In Settings activate Login 2. Login to profile account and close Activation Message 3. Activate Pick Favorite Teams 4. Choose >2 teams and note 5. Back out to Settings and Quit App (adding this in for 2016, see Expected results note) 6. Via alt computer/device, login to same MLB.com account and check profile https://secure.mlb.com/account/profile.jsp 7. Change teams and note 8. Launch app and nav to Settings 9. In app Settings page, activate Pick Favorite Teams and observe
custom_expected: Teams added via app appear as expected, adjustments made in account via MLB.com user profile page are relayed to app and appear as expected Currently app fails: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WOLF-668 https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WOLF-895
